text: Shizhe quexin cong ta de zhu jiang shi gei ta de jingdian, xinshimen ye quexin na bu jingdian, tamen ren ren dou quexin an la he ta de zhong tianshi, yiqie jingdian he zhong shizhe.(Tamen shuo):“Women duiyu ta de renhe shizhe, dou bu jiayi qishi.” Tamen shuo:“Women tingcongle, women kenqiu ni she you; women de zhu a! Ni shi zuihou de guisu.”
